sentences.english: Second, T-t curve based on field model should be.
sentences.chinese: 在基本假設條件下，建立了海底光纜故障點電場模型。

sentences.english: Its low-cost fiber-optic sensor cable is easily attached to a fence.
sentences.chinese: 低成本的光纜傳感線很容易與防護圍欄連接。

sentences.english: Optical fiber automatic monitoring system design aims at Beijing Power Supply Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 電力系統光纜自動監測系統針對北京市供電局而設計。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a non-filled dry central core optical fiber cable.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種不填充油膏的乾式中心管光纜。

sentences.english: In this article, we mainly research stranding fiber ribbon cable and side cladding multifiber ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究層絞式帶狀光纜和邊粘型大芯數光纖帶。

sentences.english: Fiber optics are becoming increasingly more common for use with Local-Area Networks (LANs).
sentences.chinese: 光纜在局域網領域的使用越來越普遍。

sentences.english: Now a network of fibers will serve as a national backbone system of longhaul transmission lines.
sentences.chinese: 光纜網絡將成爲全國長途傳輸線路的基幹。

sentences.english: Fiber-optic cable is rapidly replacing twisted-pair telephone lines.
sentences.chinese: 光纜正迅速地取代雙絞線的電話線。

sentences.english: A solution to the problem of dry band arcing on ADSS fiber optic cables is described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了ADSS光纜上幹帶飛弧問題的解決方案。

sentences.english: The new research results of dry band arcing on ADSS fiber optic cables are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 評述ADSS光纜上幹帶飛弧研究的最新成果。

sentences.english: Presently, there is an increasing demand of fibre optical cables to be used in central exchange and customer.
sentences.chinese: 目前，用於局內和大樓內的光纜需求量有很大的增長。

sentences.english: Sunlight comes into the fibre-optic cables through holes in the parabolic mirror.
sentences.chinese: 陽光通過拋物柱面鏡的洞進入到纖維光纜中。

sentences.english: The paper presents a kind of semi-dry loose tube optical cable without filling compound in the core.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種在纜芯中不填充油膏的半乾式松管光纜。

sentences.english: This Recommendation covers the characteristics of a cut-off shifted single-mode optical fibre cable.
sentences.chinese: 本建議包括截止波長位移單模光纖光纜的特性。
